text: LOS ANGELES and MIAMI ( Oct. 11, 2017 ) – Marc Anthony, Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez have joined forces to present the special benefit concert telecast “ ONE VOICE : SOMOS LIVE! A CONCERT FOR DISASTER RELIEF. ” The event will feature some of the biggest superstars in Latin music, including Marc Anthony, performing live from Miami ’ s Marlins Park stadium, as well as performances from an NBC soundstage in Los Angeles hosted by Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez, featuring a star - studded array of today ’ s biggest talent from music, TV and film. “ ONE VOICE : SOMOS LIVE! ” will air in Spanish simultaneously on Telemundo and Univision beginning at 8
